entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rainshower, 15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 2:09 PM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Light Rainshower
Temperature: 15.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 9.5°C
Wind: NW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. High 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 10 September 2016
